collectible.title: Cooper Calling Card
collectible.subtitle: The mark of a master thief.
collectible.text: This infamous calling card has become the bane of master criminals and police officers worldwide. When you discover one at the scene, you know you've been ripped off by none other than a member of the lineage of master thieves known as the Cooper Clan.

collectible.title: Thievius Raccoonus
collectible.subtitle: A treasure trove of thieving knowledge.
collectible.text:
A massive book containing the shared knowledge and history of the Cooper Clan. Originally intended to be passed down to Sly when he turned eight, it was instead stolen and distributed among the Fiendish Five. Sly later recovered his family's book, and having proven yourself a master thief in your own right, he's entrusted you with a replica.
"It doesn't take the Thievius Racoonus to make great thieves. It takes great thieves to make the Thievius Raccoonus."
collectible.unlock: Win a game against Sly, Nami, Twisted Fate, and Rouge.
